DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to compare single dose Methotrexate (MTX) to multiple dose MTX.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Single and Multiple-dose Methotrexate Therapy for Ectopic Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: unruptured tubal EP gestational mass of less than or equal to 3.5 cm in ultrasonography report hemodynamic instability contraindications related to the use of MTX hepatic renal and active pulmonary diseases peptic ulcer immune deficiency status alcohol abuse blood dyscreasia
